message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance and utility for you, valued at $10,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that such an extraordinary product becomes accessible to those who appreciate its true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this valuable transaction for you.
